title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 234.8 - Opacity
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 234.8 - Opacity

State Regulations
A person shall not cause or allow emissions having an
average opacity of 10 percent or greater for any consecutive six minute period
from any emission source subject to this Part into the outdoor
atmosphere. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
234.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
